movie.title: Love Flower
movie.description_intro: Joshua's life is unraveling. His girlfriend has a wandering eye, his boss makes him stay late every day, he's caught up in a holistic health scam and his old pal Bucky just showed up with bad news. But things aren't always as they seem.
movie.description_full: Joshua's life is unraveling. His girlfriend has a wandering eye, his boss makes him stay late every day, he's caught up in a holistic health scam and his old pal Bucky just showed up with bad news. But things aren't always as they seem.

movies.title: Gold Coast Lounge
movies.summary: An Afro-noir film taking place in the heart of Ghana. A crime family have to clean up their act before the government shuts down their private lounge.
movies.description_full: An Afro-noir film taking place in the heart of Ghana. A crime family have to clean up their act before the government shuts down their private lounge.
movies.synopsis: An Afro-noir film taking place in the heart of Ghana. A crime family have to clean up their act before the government shuts down their private lounge.

movies.title: The Cause
movies.summary: Everyday life in the heavily overcrowded PGV prison in Venezuela is run by the inmates themselves. La Causa sheds light on this dangerous prison from the inside, and the corrupt penitentiary system around it. Current and former prisoners give a staggering account of life in this parallel society and the search for liberation within it.
movies.description_full: Everyday life in the heavily overcrowded PGV prison in Venezuela is run by the inmates themselves. La Causa sheds light on this dangerous prison from the inside, and the corrupt penitentiary system around it. movies.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
movies.summary: After the terrorist attacks on 9/11, Jack Ryan, studying at the London School of Economics, becomes a U.S. Marine fighting in Afghanistan, where his spine is critically injured when his helicopter is shot down. During the recovery, he meets Cathy Muller, the medical student helping him learn to walk again, and Thomas Harper, an official with the C.I.A. who recruits him. Ten years later, Ryan is working on Wall Street covertly for the C.I.A., looking for suspect financial transactions that would indicate terrorist activity. He discovers that trillions of dollars held by Russian organizations have disappeared, funds controlled by Viktor Cherevin. Ryan's employer conducts business with Cherevin, so when Ryan discovers certain accounts are inaccessible to him as an auditor, he has reason to visit Moscow and investigate. When investigating, he discovers a plot that is related to the 9/11 attacks. Now he has to figure out the what, where, and when.

movies.title: Equals
movies.summary: A futuristic love story set in a world where emotions have been eradicated.
movies.description_full: A futuristic love story set in a world where emotions have been eradicated.
